item.title: Inaugural Post
item.description: This is my inaugural first post of the Snippets page, and I figured I would kick it off in a clich√© way: “Hello World”! Although this is not my first time writing code, this is my first successful attempt at creating a website for myself. I have actually tried doing something like this since Fall 2016; all my attempts have been quashed by some technical issue or lack of motivation on my end.

item.title: Example Page1
Rmd Example
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
